sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
sharpshooter.desc: The Sharpshooter is a Tier II evolution from the Archer Profession via Trooper, while keeping all of the Trooper's abilities the scout also gains the abilty to use Two Handed Guns.

bombadier.name: Bombadier
bombadier.desc: The Bombadier is a Tier III evolution from the Archer Profession via Trooper > Sharpshooter, while keeping all of the Sharpshooter's abilities the Bombadier also gains the abilty to use Heavy Munitions.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.desc:
The Cleric is a Tier I evolution from the Healer Profession, while keeping all of the Healers abilities the Cleric also gains the ability to use Life and Curing magic spells.

As with the Healer the Cleric can use Staves and Fists but also gains Maces.

abbot.name: Abbot
abbot.desc: The Abbot is a Tier III evolution from the Healer Profession via Friar > Monk, while keeping all of the Monks abilities the Abbot also gains the abilty to use Blessing magic spells.

protector.name: Protector
protector.desc:
The Protector is a Tier I evolution from the Healer Profession, while keeping all of the Healers abilities the Protector also gains the ability to use Healing items and Protection magic spells.

As with the Healer the Protector can use Staves and Fists but also gains Two Handed Staves and Shields.

invoker.name: Invoker
invoker.desc:
The Invoker is a Tier I evolution from the Caster Profession, while keeping all of the Caster abilities the Invoker also gains the ability to use Invocation magic spells.

As with the Caster the Invoker can use Staves and Fists.

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.desc: The Warlock is a Tier III evolution from the Caster Profession via Invoker > Summoner keeping all of the Summoners abilities the Warlock also gains the abilty to use Demonology magic and to use Mana Draining.

dark-lord.name: Dark Lord
dark-lord.desc: The Dark Lord is a Tier III evolution from the Caster Profession via Shaman > Necromancer keeping all of the Necromancers abilities the Dark Lord also gains the abilty to use Dark magic, Mana Draining and Maces.

crusader.name: Crusader
crusader.desc: The Crusader is a Tier III evolution from the Healer Profession via Protector > Paladin keeping all of the Paladins abilities the Crusader also gains the abilty to use Divine Fury.

squire.name: Squire
squire.desc:
The Squire is a Tier I evolution from the Fighter Profession, while keeping all of the Fighters abilities the Squire also gains the ability to use Shields.

As with the Fighter the Squire can use Axes, Swords, Daggers and Maces.

knight.name: Knight
knight.desc: The Knight is a Tier II evolution from the Fighter Profession via squire, while keeping all of the Squires abilities the Knight also gains the abilty to use Pole blades, Two Handed Shields, Two Handed Maces and Two Handed Swords.

grunt.name: Grunt
grunt.desc:
The Grunt is a Tier I evolution from the Fighter Profession, while keeping all of the Fighters abilities the Grunt also gains the ability to use Shields and Hand Guns.

As with the Fighter the Grunt can use Axes, Swords, Daggers and Maces.

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.desc: The Soldier is a Tier II evolution from the Fighter Profession via Grunt.

veteran.name: Veteran
veteran.desc: The Veteran is a Tier III evolution from the Fighter Profession via Grunt > Soldier keeping all of the Soldiers abilities the Veteran also gains the abilty to use Two Handed Axes and Two Handed Shields.

lumberjack.name: Lumberjack
lumberjack.desc: Lumberjack. An expert at chopping the trees of Saloa to make logs.

miner.name: Miner
miner.desc: Miner. An expert at mining the rocks of Saloa to find ore.

skinner.name: Skinner
skinner.desc: Skinner. An expert at tending the animals and creatures of Saloa to gain hides, eggs and meats.

harvestor.name: Harvestor
harvestor.desc: Harvestor. An expert at tending the plants of Saloa to gain fibers.

spearmen.name: Spearmen
spearmen.desc: Archers are experts with stringed weapons they specialise in Long/Short and Cross bows. Although preferring the size and power of the Long/Short bows over the Cross bows. They are skilled marksmen and should never be underestimated.

training-dummy.name: Training Dummy
training-dummy.desc: This dummy helps you experiment with skills.

guild-manager.name: Guild Manager
guild-manager.desc: This NPC can be setup to manage various Guild aspects.

guild-trophy-collector.name: Guild Trophy Collector
guild-trophy-collector.desc: This vendor can be used to unlock special Guild Items.

luminary-mage.name: Luminary Mage
luminary-mage.desc: Master of the Lights and the Stars.

hell-mage.name: Hell Mage
hell-mage.desc: Master of the Darkness and the depths of hell.

historian.name: Historian
historian.desc: The studier of ancient ways and cultures.

port-master.name: Port Master
port-master.desc: Responsible for the day to day runnings of the port.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.desc: The Rogue is a hard profession to classify, looked down upon by many as nefarious criminals the Rogue is often called upon or hired to perform questionable acts. The Rogue is skilled in the art of Stealth and Lockpicking, they also know how to wield a Dagger very well and can use Thrown Weapons.

priest.name: Priest
priest.desc: The Priest is a Tier II evolution from the Healer Profession via Cleric, while keeping all of the Clerics abilities the Priest also gains the abilty to use Restoration magic spells and to perform Surgery on Humanoid minions and monsters.

monk.name: Monk
monk.desc: The Monk is a Tier II evolution from the Healer Profession via Friar, while keeping all of the Friars abilities the Monk also gains the abilty to use Shields.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.desc: The Wizard is a Tier III evolution from the Caster Profession via Mage > Elementalist keeping all of the Elementalists abilities the Wizard also gains the abilty to use Air and Earth magic, Mana Draining and Maces.

caster.name: Caster
caster.desc: Through the ages the Caster profession has existed in one form or another, Casters choose the way of magic over the way of melee weapons they may specialise in Mystical spells which affect the mind and body. Although should the need arise a Caster may fight with his trusty Staff or simply pummel you with his or her fists if they desire to do so.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.desc: Throughout history we have known many wars each one tainted by the blood of the fallen souls who died defending their "point of view", the Fighter profession would in most wars be the first to die or the last person standing at the end of the conflict. They are skilled expertly in most one handed weapons to the point where they can dual wield and still be effective.

scout.name: Scout
scout.desc:
The Scout is a Tier I evolution from the Archer Profession, while keeping all of the Archers abilities the scout also gains abilities to detect places and beings that perhaps otherwise would perhaps not normally be seen.

As with the Archer the Scout can use Daggers, Bows and Crossbows.

tracker.name: Tracker
tracker.desc:
The Tracker is a Tier I evolution from the Archer Profession, while keeping all of the Archers abilities the tracker also gains the ability to Track Beasts and make Traps.

As with the Archer the Tracker can use Daggers, Bows and Crossbows but also gains Axes.

supply-master.name: Supply Master
supply-master.desc: A Quest NPC for supplying outposts.

devourer-of-might.name: Devourer of Might
devourer-of-might.desc: This ancient demon was born from the deepest parts of the Hell Plane. It feeds on might, devouring the strengths and fears of all it encounters.

close-combat.name: Close Combat
close-combat.desc: Close Combateers rely on there fast reflexes, keen eye and advanced melee skills to pound there enemies into dust. Close Combat fighters rarely use weapons and when they do they are normally very light and small.

treasure-hunter.name: Treasure Hunter
treasure-hunter.desc:
The Treasure Hunter is a Tier III evolution from the Salvager Profession, while keeping all of the Salvager abilities the Treasure Hunter also gains the ability to use Track Items.

Treasure Hunters can use Fists, Crossbows, Swords, Shields and Hand Guns, and they gets a +30% looted money bonus and access to Tier III Salvage goods.

djinn.name: Djinn
djinn.desc: Master of the 7 Winds and Weather of Saloa.

cloth-goods-vendor.name: Cloth Goods Vendor
cloth-goods-vendor.desc: Elven Carpenter. An expert at creating wooden items from planks.

tailor.name: Tailor
tailor.desc: Maker of clothes and cloth materials.

leather-goods-vendor.name: Leather Goods Vendor
leather-goods-vendor.desc: Pixie Tailor. An expert at creating tailored items from cloth and hide and feathers.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.desc: Blacksmith. An expert at creating metal items from ingots.

plate-goods-vendor.name: Plate Goods Vendor
plate-goods-vendor.desc: Dwarven Smith. An expert at creating metal and magmite items.

stonemason.name: Stonemason
stonemason.desc: An expert sculpter, brick maker and general miner.

mail-goods-vendor.name: Mail Goods Vendor
mail-goods-vendor.desc: Centaur Mason. An expert at creating stone items from quarried stone.

alchemist.name: Alchemist
alchemist.desc: Alchemists are experts at making potions and special items for use by everyone. An alchemis often travels throughout the land to gather his ingredients and manufactures his special brew.

farmer.name: Farmer
farmer.desc: Throughout history we have known many wars each one tainted by the blood of the fallen souls who died defending their "point of view", the Fighter profession would in most wars be the first to die or the last person standing at the end of the conflict. They are skilled expertly in most one handed weapons to the point where they can dual wield and still be effective.

cook.name: Cook
cook.desc: An expert food and drink maker, who likes nothing more than to bake a good cake every now and then.

fisher.name: Fisher
fisher.desc: Fisher. An expert at fishing in the rivers, lakes and seas to catch fish.

ice-mage.name: Ice Mage
ice-mage.desc: Ice Mage. An expert at casting Ice Magic.

fire-mage.name: Fire Mage
fire-mage.desc: Fire Mage. An expert at casting Fire Magic.

earth-mage.name: Earth Mage
earth-mage.desc: Earth Mage. An expert at casting Earth Magic.

water-mage.name: Water Mage
water-mage.desc: Water Mage. An expert at casting Water Magic.

gift-vendor.name: Gift Vendor
gift-vendor.desc: Sells various trinkets and goods for holidays.

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.desc: The Ranger is a Tier III evolution from the Archer Profession via Scout > Beastmaster, while keeping all of the Beastmasters abilities the Ranger also gains the abilty to use Wildlife magic and to wield Two Handed Swords.

port-shipmaster.name: Port Shipmaster
port-shipmaster.desc: Responsible for improving ships and buying or selling new ships.

crime-master.name: Crime Master
crime-master.desc: The dealer of trouble and crimes.

necromancer.name: Necromancer
necromancer.desc: The Necromancer is a Tier II evolution from the Caster Profession via Shaman, while keeping all of the Shamans abilities the Necromancer also gains the abilty to use Necromancy magic spells and to use Two Handed Staves.

appraiser.name: Appraiser
appraiser.desc: The appraiser is a master of discovering the truth about items, buildings and players

tinkerer.name: Tinkerer
tinkerer.desc: Someone who is skilled in the manufacture of items and machines for advanced use.

creature.name: Creature
creature.desc: A creature which has no set profession.

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.desc:
The Warrior is a Tier I evolution from the Fighter Profession, while keeping all of the Fighters abilities the Warrior also gains the ability to use Shields.

As with the Fighter the Warrior can use Axes, Swords, Daggers and Maces.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.desc: The Paladin is a Tier III evolution from the Fighter Profession via Squire > Knight > Paladin, the Paladin gains the ability to Track Undead and wield Pole Blades and Two Handed Swords.

shaman.name: Shaman
shaman.desc:
The Shaman is a Tier I evolution from the Caster Profession, while keeping all of the Caster abilities the Shaman also gains the ability to use Acid, Spirit and Transmigration magic spells.

As with the Caster the Shaman can use Staves and Fists.

stable-master.name: Stable Master
stable-master.desc: The seller and keeper of pets and creatures.

child.name: Child
child.desc: A smaller version of a full grown person.

friar.name: Friar
friar.desc:
The Friar is a Tier I evolution from the Healer Profession, while keeping all of the Healers abilities the Friar also gains the ability to use Healing items and Curing magic spells.

As with the Healer the Friar can use Staves and Fists but also gains Two Handed Staves.

quartermaster.name: Quartermaster
quartermaster.desc: An NPC that gives out rewards based on the amount of tokens or required items a player has found.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.desc: The Assassin is a Tier II evolution from the Rogue Profession via Shadowstalker, while keeping all of the Shadowstalkers abilities the Assassin also gains the abilty to use Shadow-strike allowing them to attack while stealthed and deal Shadow strike damage.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.desc: The Hunter is a Tier II evolution from the Archer Profession via Tracker, while keeping all of the Trackers abilities the Hunter also gains the abilty to track Beasts, Humanoids, Undeads and to track Criminals.

post-master.name: Post Master
post-master.desc: The manager of a post office.

guide.name: Guide
guide.desc: A helper/guide in the land of Saloa.

hunt-master.name: Hunt Master
hunt-master.desc: Someone who hides items and makes people hunt for them.

tempest-mage.name: Tempest Mage
tempest-mage.desc: Master of the 7 Winds and Weather of Saloa.

demonic-follower.name: Demonic Follower
demonic-follower.desc: A follower of the ways of the demon plane.

fleshcraver.name: Fleshcraver
fleshcraver.desc: The scariest of all the undead, even there own bretherin fear the mention of there names.

wild-animal.name: Wild Animal
wild-animal.desc: A animal  which has no set profession.

mudslinger.name: Mudslinger
mudslinger.desc: A profession dedicated to throwing mud and other gooey things.

powerseeker.name: Powerseeker
powerseeker.desc: Those that seek ultimate control over magic often turn towards this profession.

arch-priest.name: Arch Priest
arch-priest.desc: The Arch Priest is a Tier III evolution from the Healer Profession via Cleric > Priest, while keeping all of the Priests abilities the Arch Priest also gains the abilty to use Blessing magic spells.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.desc: The Berserker is a Tier II evolution from the Fighter Profession via Warrior, while keeping all of the Warriors abilities the Berserker also gains the abilty to use Rocks and Boulders, Two Handed Axes and Two Handed Maces.

athlete.name: Athlete
athlete.desc: Athletes are the general profession. They offer great speed and dexterity benefits and are often very rounded. They do not specialise in one particular area but instead revel at doing many things.

trooper.name: Trooper
trooper.desc:
The Trooper is a Tier I evolution from the Archer Profession or a Tier II evolution from the Fighter Profession, while keeping all of the Archers abilities the Trooper also gains the ability to Dual Wield.

As with the Archer the Trooper can use Daggers, Bows and Crossbows but also gains Axes, Hand Guns, Swords and Shields.

banker.name: Banker
banker.desc: Stores gold and items for a small price.

vicar.name: Vicar
vicar.desc: A religious soul who can marry characters, divorce them and bury them.

estate-agent.name: Estate Agent
estate-agent.desc: The seller of houses and house deeds.

elementalist.name: Elementalist
elementalist.desc: The Elementalist is a Tier II evolution from the Caster Profession via mage, while keeping all of the Mages abilities the Elementalist also gains the abilty to use Cold, Water, Fire and Energy magic spells .

librarian.name: Librarian
librarian.desc: One who studies books and collates manuscripts and records of history.

bounty-master.name: Bounty Master
bounty-master.desc: A person responsible for handling bounty and the assignment of criminal capture.

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.desc: The Summoner is a Tier II evolution from the Caster Profession via Invoker, while keeping all of the Invokers abilities the Summoner also gains the abilty to use Summoning magic spells and to use Two Handed Staves.

beastmaster.name: Beastmaster
beastmaster.desc:
The Beastmaster is a Tier II evolution from the Archer Profession via Scout, the Beastmaster gains the ability to Breed Beasts and Tame Beasts.

This allows the Beastmaster to tame any Beast type monster to be their loyal and loving minion and also to breed minions to make new pets.

You can sell or trade these pets on to other players.

minstrel.name: Minstrel
minstrel.desc: Minstrels are those happy singing souls that can be found sitting at a crossroads playing a lute or harp and singing peacefully to themselves or the animals. Minstrels can and often do strike fear into the hearts of many with there magics.

player-vendor.name: Player Vendor
player-vendor.desc: A vendor owned by a player.

chamberlain.name: Chamberlain
chamberlain.desc: Responsible for Administering the guild Credit System.

blowbringer.name: Blowbringer
blowbringer.desc: Warriors are weapons experts specialising in large weapons such as Double Axes and Clubs. Warriors are not known for there accuracy instead prefer to go for damage and there fearsome battle cries to strike fear into the enemy.

whelp-demon.name: Whelp Demon
whelp-demon.desc: An all round pet, with reasonable stats and a varied amount of skills.

willpower-demon.name: Willpower Demon
willpower-demon.desc: A demon that steals the Willpower (stamina) of the enemy.

devourer-of-magic.name: Devourer of Magic
devourer-of-magic.desc: This ancient demon was born from the deepest parts of the Hell Plane. It feeds on magic, devouring the energies of those that it encounters.

faction-recruiter.name: Faction Recruiter
faction-recruiter.desc: Responsible for getting a player to participate in a faction based event.

fistfury.name: Fistfury
fistfury.desc: Close Combateers rely on there fast reflexes, keen eye and advanced melee skills to pound there enemies into dust. Close Combat fighters rarely use weapons and when they do they are normally very light and small.

spellsage.name: Spellsage
spellsage.desc: Those that seek ultimate control over magic often turn towards this profession.

archer.name: Archer
archer.desc: The Archer is a dedicated ranged weapon user, skilled expertly in Bows and Crossbows they prefer to sit at the back of any encounter and shoot from range, however should ones enemy deflect an arrow or charge blindly through the maelstrom many an Archer has been known to quickly unsheath a Dagger and finish the foe.

healer.name: Healer
healer.desc: Reverred and worshipped throughout the ages, the Healer profession has been known to perform many miracles, some believe the Healers to be merely angels (or demons) who walk the lands doing the work of the gods. While a healer is not skilled enough to revive dead people they can bring the wounded or sick back to full life as easily as one might draw breath.

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: The Thief is a Tier II evolution from the Rogue Profession via Pickpocket, while keeping all of the Pickpockets abilities the Thief also gains the abilty to use Deception and Swords.

mage.name: Mage
mage.desc:
The Mage is a Tier I evolution from the Caster Profession, while keeping all of the Caster abilities the Mage also gains the ability to use Defensive magic spells.

As with the Caster the Mage can use Staves and Fists.

forager.name: Forager
forager.desc: Foragers are the loners of Saloa, they shun people and civilisations and are normally very unfriendly to people they meet on there travels. They are experts at self survival.

nobleman.name: Nobleman
nobleman.desc: Noblemen are the upper class, born into a rich family or lifestyle, they don't have to work very hard and can often talk there enemies around or bribe them till they submit. They are trained in Blades by some of the finest blade masters in all of Saloa.

woodworker.name: Woodworker
woodworker.desc: Woodworkers are experts at Carpentry and Woodworking. They rely on there excellent skills to manufacture wooden objects such as Shields and wooden weapons.

carpenter.name: Carpenter
carpenter.desc: Carpenter. An expert at creating wooden items from planks.

quarrier.name: Quarrier
quarrier.desc: Quarrier. An expert at Quarrying rocks for stone.

peasant.name: Peasant
peasant.desc: The mark of a thievery attempt.

despicable-one.name: Despicable One
despicable-one.desc: The spawn from a big big questy.

free-enchanter.name: Free Enchanter
free-enchanter.desc: A person with the ability to enchant items.

warlord.name: Warlord
warlord.desc: The Warlord is a Tier III evolution from the Fighter Profession via Warrior > Berserker keeping all of the Berserkers abilities the Warlord also gains the abilty to use Devotion.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.desc:
The Pickpocket is a Tier I evolution from the Rogue Profession, while keeping all of the Rogues abilities the Pickpocket also gains the ability to use Disguise and to Steal.

As with the Rogue the Pickpocket can use Daggers, Fists and Thrown Weapons.

crimelord.name: Crimelord
crimelord.desc: The Crimelord is a Tier III evolution from the Rogue Profession via Pickpocket > Thief keeping all of the Thieves abilities the Crimelord also gains the abilty to use Hand Guns.

shadowstalker.name: Shadowstalker
shadowstalker.desc:
The Shadowstalker is a Tier I evolution from the Rogue Profession, while keeping all of the Rogues abilities the Shadowstalker also gains the ability to Detect Hidden enemies and buildings.

As with the Rogue the Shadowstalker can use Daggers, Fists and Thrown Weapons but they also gain access to Swords.

trickster.name: Trickster
trickster.desc:
The Trickster is a Tier I evolution from the Rogue Profession, while keeping all of the Rogues abilities the Trickster also gains the ability to Deceive players by hiding the true identity of items and objects.

As with the Rogue the Trickster can use Daggers, Fists and Thrown Weapons but they also gain access to Swords.

deceiver.name: Deceiver
deceiver.desc: The Deceiver is a Tier II evolution from the Rogue Profession via Trickster, while keeping all of the Tricksters abilities the Deceiver also gains the abilty to use Disguise.

bard.name: Bard
bard.desc: The Bard is a Tier III evolution from the Rogue Profession via Trickster > Deceiver keeping all of the Deceivers abilities the Bard also gains the abilty to use Instruments and Songs.

killer.name: Killer
killer.desc: The Killer is a Tier III evolution from the Rogue Profession via Shadowstalker > Assassin keeping all of the Assassins abilities the Killer also gains the abilty to use Track Humanoids and to use Crossbows.

hermit.name: Hermit
hermit.desc: The Hermit lives a life of isolation, often they will spend countless hours in the woods ... no one knows what they do out there but you can often hear strange noises. Hermits dedicate themselves to the study of plants and nature. Although should the need arise a Hermit may fight with his trusty 2Handed Staff or simply pummel you with his or her fists if they desire to do so.you are likely to see a first hand demonstration of a Hermits skills.

diviner.name: Diviner
diviner.desc:
The Diviner is a Tier I evolution from the Hermit Profession, while keeping all of the Hermits abilities the Diviner also gains the ability to use Warding spells.

As with the Hermit the Diviner can use 2H Staves and Fists.

warden.name: Warden
warden.desc:
The Warden is a Tier II evolution from the Diviner Profession, while keeping all of the Diviners abilities the Warder also gains the ability to use Botany magic spells.

As with the Diviner the Warden can use 2H Staves and Fists.

druid.name: Druid
druid.desc: The Druid is a Tier III evolution from the Hermit Profession via Diviner > Warden keeping all of the Warders abilities the Druid also gains the abilty to use Druid magic.

beastlord.name: Beastlord
beastlord.desc:
The Beastlord is a Tier III evolution via Tracker > Hunter, the Beastlordr gains the ability to Breed Beasts and Tame Beasts.

This allows the Beastlord to tame any Beast type monster to be their loyal and loving minion and also to breed minions to make new pets.

You can sell or trade these pets on to other players.

protection-demon.name: Protection Demon
protection-demon.desc: A demon that can do no physical damage, yet blocks attacks against its master.

leech-demon.name: Leech Demon
leech-demon.desc: A demon that steals the life (health) of the enemy.

soul-demon.name: Soul Demon
soul-demon.desc: A demon that steals the soul (mana power) of the enemy.

pit-demon.name: Pit Demon
pit-demon.desc: A demon that uses spells on the enemy.

salvager.name: Salvager
salvager.desc:
The Salvager is often regarded as someone who has no thought for preserving the relics of the past, they would rather smash a priceless vase on their hunt for gold and jewels than preserve it for future generations.

Salvagers can deconstruct items using the Deconstruction skill (starting skill), they can also Salvage corpses once they are out of the estate to gain additional resources.

Salvagers get a 10% looted money increase and access to Tier 1 Salvage goods.

adventurer.name: Adventurer
adventurer.desc:
The Adventurer is a Tier II evolution from the Salvager Profession, while keeping all of the Salvager abilities the Adventurer also gains the ability to use Track Dungeons, a powerful skill which lets them track player and system dungeons.

The Adventurer gets a +20% looted money bonus and access to Tier II Salvage goods.

As with the Salvager the Adventuer can use Crossbows, Swords, Fists and Shields.

archaeologist.name: Archaeologist
archaeologist.desc:
The Archaeologist is a Tier IV evolution from the Salvager Profession via Adventurer > Treasure Hunter keeping all of the Treasure Hunters abilities the Archaeologist also gains the abilty to use Archaeology, which allows them to uncover relics from long ago.

The Archaeologist gets a +30% looted money bonus and access to Tier IV Salvage goods.

routemaster.name: Routemaster
routemaster.desc: Responsible for the logistics of managing a trade route.

apprentice.name: Apprentice
apprentice.desc: The Apprentice is a dedicated crafter/gather, this class has no combat skills and can not participate in combat or dueling, however it does have enhanced gathering and crafting abilities and faster queue times.

novice.name: Novice
novice.desc: The Novice is a Tier I evolution from the Apprentice  Profession.

adept.name: Adept
adept.desc: The Adept is a Tier II evolution from the Novice Profession.

master.name: Master
master.desc: The Master  is a Tier III evolution from the Apprentice Profession via Novice > Adept.

buccaneer.name: Buccaneer
buccaneer.desc: The Novice is a Tier I evolution from the Privateer Profession.

sailor.name: Sailor
sailor.desc: The Novice is a Tier I evolution from the Privateer Profession.

raider.name: Raider
raider.desc: The Adept is a Tier II evolution from the Buccaneer Profession.

swashbuckler.name: Swashbuckler
swashbuckler.desc: The Adept is a Tier II evolution from the Sailor Profession.

pirate.name: Pirate
pirate.desc: The Master is a Tier III evolution from the Privateer Profession via Buccaneer> Raider.

pirate-hunter.name: Pirate Hunter
pirate-hunter.desc: The Master is a Tier III evolution from the Privateer Profession via Sailor > Swashbuckler.

devourer-of-cookies.name: Devourer of Cookies
devourer-of-cookies.desc: This ancient demon was born from the deepest darkest parts of the kitchen. It`s mission in life is to seek out and destroy all of the cookies in the world!

champion.name: Champion
champion.desc: The Champion is a Tier III evolution from the Mercenary Profession by way of Gladiator > Vanquisher, gaining enhanced stats.

templar.name: Templar
templar.desc: The Templar is a Tier II evolution from the Healer Profession via Protector, the Templar gains Spell Evasion and the ability to wield Pole Blades and Two Handed Swords.

advanced-collector.name: Advanced Collector
advanced-collector.desc: A paid bonus NPC, with special quests.

corruptor-of-worlds.name: Corruptor of Worlds
corruptor-of-worlds.desc: The ancient leader of the Demons.

shaper.name: Shaper
shaper.desc: The Shaper is a Tier I evolution from the Animator Profession.

manipulator.name: Manipulator
manipulator.desc: The  Manipulator is a Tier II evolution from the Animator Profession via Shaper.

geomancer.name: Geomancer
geomancer.desc: The Geomancer is a Tier III evolution from the Animator Profession via Shaper > Manipulator.

animator.name: Animator
animator.desc: The Animator uses basic components to create golems and other automotrons. They are more defensively natured than most classes and instead rely on their creations to do all of the hard work for them.

stargazer.name: Stargazer
stargazer.desc: The Stargazer spends their time gazing intently up at the heavens, watching the stars and wondering what fate they might have in store for them.

stardreamer.name: Stardreamer
stardreamer.desc: The Stardreamer is a Tier I evolution from the Stargazer Profession, while keeping all of the Stargazers abilities the Stardreamer also gains the ability to choose an additional constellation.

starchaser.name: Starchaser
starchaser.desc: The Starchaser is a Tier II evolution from the Stargazer Profession via the Stardreamer Profession, while keeping all of the Stardreamers abilities the Starchaser also gains the ability to choose an additional constellation.

star-catcher.name: Star Catcher
star-catcher.desc: The Star Catcher is a Tier III evolution from the Stargazer Profession via Stardreamer > Starchaser while keeping all of the Starchasers abilities the Star Catcher can also choose an additional constellation.

enchantress.name: Enchantress
enchantress.desc: The Enchantress is a Tier I evolution from the Hag Profession.

spy.name: Spy
spy.desc:
The Spy is a Tier I evolution from the Farmer Profession, while keeping all of the Farmers abilities the Spy also gains the ability to Track Items and Stealth.

As with the Farmer the Spy can use Axes and Fists but also gains Daggers and Thrown Weapons.

conscript.name: Conscript
conscript.desc:
The Conscript is a Tier I evolution from the Farmer Profession, while keeping all of the Farmer abilities the Conscript also gains the ability to use Swords.

As with the Farmer the Conscript can use Axes and Fists.

shadow-collective-agent.name: Shadow Collective Agent
shadow-collective-agent.desc: An agent of the Shadow Collective.

temptress.name: Temptress
temptress.desc: The  Temptress is a Tier II evolution from the Hag Profession via Enchantress

witch.name: Witch
witch.desc: The Witch is a Tier III evolution from the Hag Profession via Enchantress > Temptress.

hag.name: Hag
hag.desc: The Hag is a hybrid combat class primarily using melee combat at lower levels and then a mix of magic and melee at higher levels.

denshi.name: Denshi
denshi.desc: The Denshi is a Tier II evolution from the Farmer Profession via spy, while keeping all of the Spies abilities the Denshi also gains the abilty to use Targeted Combat.

samurai.name: Samurai
samurai.desc: The Samurai is a Tier II evolution from the Farmer Profession via conscript, while keeping all of the Conscripts abilities the Samurai also gains the abilty to use Way of the Warrior, Taunting and Two Handed Swords.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.desc: The Ninja is a Tier III evolution from the Farmer Profession via Spy > Denshi > Ninja, the Ninja gains the ability to use Parlor Tricks and Lockpick.

shogun.name: Shogun
shogun.desc: The Shogun is a Tier III evolution from the Farmer Profession via Conscript > Samurai > Shogun, the Shogun gains the ability to claim taxes via Lordship and to wield Pole Weapons.

mercenary.name: Mercenary
mercenary.desc: A hired hand, useful for certain encounters.

gladiator.name: Gladiator
gladiator.desc: The Gladiator is a Tier I evolution from the Mercenary Profession, gaining enhanced stats.

vanquisher.name: Vanquisher
vanquisher.desc: The Vanquisher is a Tier II evolution from the Mercenary Profession by way of Gladiator, gaining enhanced stats.

gladiator-appraiser.name: Gladiator Appraiser
gladiator-appraiser.desc: The appraiser is a master of discovering the truth about items, buildings and players

majestic-mini-boss.name: Majestic Mini Boss
majestic-mini-boss.desc: Bought extra pet Mini boss class.

alien-guardian.name: Alien Guardian
alien-guardian.desc: An elite alien guardian of ubernation!

stitchworker.name: Stitchworker
stitchworker.desc: The Stitchworker is a Tier I evolution from the Inventor Profession, while keeping all of the Inventor abilities the Stitchworker also gains the ability to use Blood over Beauty and a weapon skill of your choosing.

flesh-dealer.name: Flesh Dealer
flesh-dealer.desc: The Flesh Dealer is a Tier II evolution from the Inventor Profession via Stitchworker.

mutilator.name: Mutilator
mutilator.desc: The Warmachine is a Tier III evolution from the Inventor Profession via Stitchworker > Flesh Dealer.

junker.name: Junker
junker.desc: The Junker is a Tier I evolution from the Inventor Profession, while keeping all of the Inventor abilities the Junker also gains the ability to use Bolts over Brains and a weapon skill of your choosing.

clockwork.name: Clockwork
clockwork.desc: The Flesh Dealer is a Tier II evolution from the Inventor Profession via Junker.

war-machine.name: War Machine
war-machine.desc: The War Machine is a Tier III evolution from the Inventor Profession via Junker > Clockwork.
